titles.title: Recognizing that more than 160,000,000 people in India are considered untouchable and dehumanized by the caste system.
Recognizing that more than 160,000,000 people in India are considered untouchable and dehumanized by the caste system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Recognizes the caste system's debilitating influence on the daily lives of millions in India and encourages the United States to work with India to find new approaches to this age-old problem.
